english.segment1: Shelter me. With mercury vials. Escape is the machine to. Shelter me. With media tablets. We'll turn today into a-. Dream. More doses. More screens. More vials to
english.segment2: Shelter me. With sweet escape. I'm looking for a place to run to. To hide inside
english.segment3: Silence me. Prescribe me your cancer. If I will disappear. You'll. Silence me. I'll welcome the virus. If you can promise this-. Dream. More doses. More screens. More vials to
english.segment4: Don't bother me with details. Don't bore me with what's real. Distraction is all I need. All I need all I need to shelter me
